abstract: college football : 2017 hyundai sun bowl odds and prediction .
article: el paso , tx -- december 31 : the oregon state beavers and the pittsburgh panthers during the brut sun bowl on december 31 , 2008 at the sun bowl in el paso , texas . 2017 hyundai sun bowl odds and predictionbowl season is really ramping up with nine games between friday and saturday . i will be here giving you all of the info you need to make an educated pick against the spread if you so choose . bowl season got off to a tough start , but i have improved lately . next up is the hyundai sun bowl !

for the rest of the bowl season , you will get my picks against the spread and point wagers just like i did all season long . i had a solid regular season , but i can make it look a whole lot better with a strong bowl season !

the sun devils won 44-13 . north carolina state vs. arizona state at el paso , tx : north carolina state 8-4 , 6-2 : wins : vs. marshall , vs. furman , at florida state , vs. syracuse , vs. louisville , at pittsburgh , at boston college , vs. north carolinalosses : vs. south carolina , at notre dame , vs. clemson , at wake forestrecord vs. bowl teams : 4-4the wolfpack flourished under boise state transfer ryan finley . the emergence of junior rb nyheim hines also helped the wolfpack to another eight win season . they lost three of the last five , but the schedule was backloaded this year with two top ten teams in that span .

this team goes as finley does . this was a solid , but unspectacular defense . they did n't hold anyone to single digits , but did n't allow 40 either . arizona state 7-5 , 6-3 : wins : vs. new mexico state , vs. oregon , vs. washington , at utah , vs. colorado , at oregon state , vs. arizonalosses : vs. san diego state , at texas tech , at stanford , vs. usc , at uclarecord vs. bowl teams : 5-5this offense is loaded with playmakers . demario richard is a very good back , but kalen ballage is a game changer .

he has breakaway speed that few can match . n'keal harry is going to be playing on sundays in the near future . manny wilkins had a solid year , but you can look at the schedule and see where he came up short . the defense , particularly the run defense was a sore spot . bryce love carved them up . as with most teams that have seen a coaching change , the sun devils will be operating with a skeleton coaching crew . that could have an impact . prediction : this is going to come down to how well hines can run the ball on this defense .

this could be a surprisingly high scoring game with the arm of finley and a good back in hines . i do n't know that nc state has the playmakers on defense to keep arizona state from lighting up the scoreboard . however , the inconsistencies at quarterback and the gutted coaching staff give the advantage to the wolfpack . pick : north carolina statestay tuned for the rest of the bowl picks against the spread , and our dfs picks for the nba , nfl , and even some nhl action ! we have something for everyonemore from fantasy cpr college football : 2017 belk bowl odds and prediction32m ago fanduel nhl blue line power plays : december 289h ago nba dfs picks and pivots -- thursday december 2810h ago 2017 san diego county credit union holiday bowl odds and prediction12h ago college football : 2017 valero alamo bowl odds and prediction13h ago 2017 hyundai sun bowl odds and prediction bowl season is really ramping up with nine games between friday and saturday .
